# Online Survey

 ![bulma version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bulma-0.9.3-brightgreen?logo=bulma) ![chartJS](https://img.shields.io/badge/Chart.js-brightgreen?logo=chart.js&color=grey) ![amCharts](https://img.shields.io/badge/amCharts-brightgreen?color=gray&logo=data:image/png;base64,) 

## Online Demo

https://nakson-online-survey.herokuapp.com/

## Description

- This project is a **an online survey**

  - Using **Express.js** to build the webserver

  - Using **Loki.js** as the database of the application

  - Using **Bulma** to support webpage layout and responsive web design

  - Using **AJAX technology** to submit and request data

  - 3 different types of **interactive charts** that displayed after each survey feedback submission.

  - the data visualization are developed with **Chart.js** and **amCharts**


## Usage

1. Install Dev Dependencies

```sh
npm install
```

2. To start development server

```sh
npm run start
```

## UI Design

Background Theme: A free [Bulma](https://bulma.io/) template built by [cssninjaStudio](https://cssninja.io).

Data visualization: [Chart.js](https://www.chartjs.org/) and [amCharts](https://www.amcharts.com/)
